basics.name: SHIN CHUNGSIK
basics.heading: Unreal Engine Client Developer
basics.summary: I participated in shooting simulation and video shooting projects utilizing Unreal Engine, and formed a team to carry out the projects. I also planned, developed, and participated in projects to build services and systems within the company.

career.description: Development of Unreal Engine simulation and modeling, video production, and training ground systems
I trained and performed duties for the Special Forces team and high-value target assassination operations within the Republic of Korea Army Special Forces for five years.
